body: I don't see a lot of valid reason to be able to vote posts up or down from people's post history without clicking on the comment thread. Its better to have context when you vote a comment up or down and if the vote buttons were not there, it would be a significantly more annoying for those who try to downvote your whole post history .
body_html: I don't see a lot of valid reason to be able to vote posts up or down from people's post history without clicking on the comment thread. Its better to have context when you vote a comment up or down and if the vote buttons were not there, it would be a significantly more annoying for those who try to downvote your whole post history .
title: Suggestion: remove vote buttons from profile history

body:
Stupid bait is stupid, but I'll bite.

It's fine when people downvote stuff they dislike. The issue is when someone decides to downvote everything a certain poster shares - because then the voting system isn't sorting content out, it becomes a popularity contest.

This doesn't happen only when people dislike something "degenerate" (whatever crap this means). It happens in general. 

OP isn't "asking help to the admins", he's suggesting something and explaining why he thinks the suggestion improves Ruqqus.
body_html:
Stupid bait is stupid, but I'll bite.

It's fine when people downvote stuff they dislike. The issue is when someone decides to downvote everything a certain poster shares - because then the voting system isn't sorting content out, it becomes a popularity contest.

This doesn't happen only when people dislike something "degenerate" (whatever crap this means). It happens in general.

OP isn't "asking help to the admins", he's suggesting something and explaining why he thinks the suggestion improves Ruqqus.

parent.body: Oh noooe! My REP!!!! I posted degenerate shit and I'm being downvoted!! HOW COULD THIS BE HAPPENING TO ME? HELP ME SPEZ! HELP MEEEEEEE!
parent.body_html: Oh noooe! My REP!!!! I posted degenerate shit and I'm being downvoted!! HOW COULD THIS BE HAPPENING TO ME? HELP ME SPEZ! HELP MEEEEEEE!

post.body: I don't see a lot of valid reason to be able to vote posts up or down from people's post history without clicking on the comment thread. Its better to have context when you vote a comment up or down and if the vote buttons were not there, it would be a significantly more annoying for those who try to downvote your whole post history .
post.body_html: I don't see a lot of valid reason to be able to vote posts up or down from people's post history without clicking on the comment thread. Its better to have context when you vote a comment up or down and if the vote buttons were not there, it would be a significantly more annoying for those who try to downvote your whole post history .
post.title: Suggestion: remove vote buttons from profile history

body: I can, you can visit a profile and downvote everything they've posted, or conversely upvote everything.  The question is, is that a feature we want?
body_html: I can, you can visit a profile and downvote everything they've posted, or conversely upvote everything. The question is, is that a feature we want?

body: Yea lol the whole karma like system is trash. Just leads to people farming for it and trying to get more than the others for some kind of weird validation. Doesn't get more pathetic than people who delete comments that get downvoted.
